constructor.details: Sets the correct instance of ContractManager so that the contract may be able to call functions from other     contracts

params._manager: The address of the instance of ContractManager

getAllCitizens().details: Returns a dynamic array containing all registered citizens' addresses

login(address).details: Returns the data of a specific user if it's a registered citizen

params._user: The address of the citizen whose data to return

registerCitizen(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,.details: Registers the user who calls this function as a citizen

params._fiscalCode: The fiscal code of the citizen to register
params._mail: The e-mail of the citizen to register
params._name: The name of the citizen to register
params._surname: The surname of the citizen to register
